subdisciplines.name: Virology
subdisciplines.description: The study of viruses, their characteristics, structure, and behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Bacteriology
subdisciplines.description: The study of bacteria, including their structure, properties, and genetics.

subdisciplines.name: Mycology
subdisciplines.description: The study of fungi, including their taxonomy, structure, and interactions with other organisms.

subdisciplines.name: Parasitology
subdisciplines.description: The study of parasites, including their life cycles, behavior, and impact on host organisms.
